name: Dungeondrift
description:
Dungeondrift is a retro style 2d procedurally generated roguelike.

Description coming.

This game is currently in development this is version 0.1.

Version 0.1 features:

  • Shooting
  • Dashing
  • Health and dying
  • Music (Music from Stonewoodgames)
  • Menus

Version 0.2 (Upcoming version):

  • Procedurally generated levels
  • More enemies
  • Money
  • Shops
  • Minimap
  • Different weapons
  • Multiple characters
  • A boss

There is WAY more to come, more game feel is coming in 1.2 and more levels in 1.3.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move around, no arrows
  • Space - Dash
  • Left mouse click - Gun shoot
  • ESC or P - Pause menu
